00053 /**
00054  * @brief Enumeration of CK_SLED prescaler.
00055  */
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058   SLED_CLKPRE_DIV1 = 0,
00059   SLED_CLKPRE_DIV2,
00060   SLED_CLKPRE_DIV4,
00061   SLED_CLKPRE_DIV3
00062 } SLED_CLKPRE_TypeDef;
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * @brief Definition of SLED Init Structure.
00066  */
00067 typedef struct
00068 {
00069   u8 ClockPrescaler;
00070   u8 BaudRate;
00071   u8 T0H;
00072   u8 T1H;
00073   u8 TRST;
00074   u8 SyncState;
00075   u8 IdleState;
00076   u8 ResetState;
00077   u8 SyncMode;
00078   u8 OutputPolarity;
00079 } SLED_InitTypeDef;

00081   * @}

00084 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /** @defgroup SLED_Exported_Constants SLED exported constants
00086   * @{
00087   */
00088 #define SLED_SYNC_STATE_T0              (0)
00089 #define SLED_SYNC_STATE_T1              (1)
00090 
00091 #define SLED_IDLE_STATE_LOW             (0)
00092 #define SLED_IDLE_STATE_HIGH            (1)
00093 
00094 #define SLED_RESET_STATE_LOW            (0)
00095 #define SLED_RESET_STATE_HIGH           (1)
00096 
00097 #define SLED_SYNC_MODE_DISABLE          (0)
00098 #define SLED_SYNC_MODE_ENABLE           (1)
00099 
00100 #define SLED_OUTPUT_NONINVERTING        (0)
00101 #define SLED_OUTPUT_INVERTING           (1)
00102 
00103 #define SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_0               (0 << 6)
00104 #define SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_1               (1 << 6)
00105 #define SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_2               (2 << 6)
00106 #define SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_3               (3 << 6)
00107 
00108 #define IS_SLED_FIFO_LEVEL(LEVEL)       ((LEVEL == SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_0) || \
00109                                          (LEVEL == SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_1) || \
00110                                          (LEVEL == SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_2) || \
00111                                          (LEVEL == SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_3))
00112                                                      
00113 #define IS_SLED(SLED)                   ((SLED == HT_SLED0) || (SLED == HT_SLED1))
00114 /**
00115   * @}
00116   */
